entry.title: Arthur Bown (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Arthur Bown designed Harrogate's Jubilee Memorial (pictured) to commemorate Queen Victoria's golden jubilee?

entry.title: Jay Owen Light (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Jay Owen Light aspired to be an astronaut before becoming the dean of Harvard Business School?

entry.title: caped Atatürk Monument (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that a caped Atatürk Monument by Gürdal Duyar was erected in Uşak in 1965 after a campaign by the Milliyet newspaper to erect Atatürk monuments in provinces that did not have them?

entry.title: Anti-Hero (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that in the music video for the song "Anti-Hero", Taylor Swift imagines a scenario in which she is killed by her own daughter-in-law?

entry.title: te lapa (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that te lapa, an unproven and unexplained oceanic light phenomenon, might have been used by Polynesians to find islands in the Pacific Ocean?

entry.title: The Immaculate Collection (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that The Immaculate Collection was the first album to use QSound?

entry.title: Cape Grim Air Archive (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Cape Grim Air Archive in Tasmania has been collecting air samples for more than 40 years?

entry.title: J. Elroy McCaw (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that J. Elroy McCaw feigned losing his wallet to make women pay for meals at restaurants?
